titleStmt.title: The historie of Italie a boke excedyng profitable to be redde: because it intreateth of the astate of many and diuers common weales, how thei haue ben, [and] now be gouerned.
titleStmt.author: Thomas, William, Clerk of the Council to Edward VI.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete in the house of Thomas Berthelet],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; his initials appear at foot of title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
